% Question: Do you think that global warming is happening?
\pgfplotstableread{
X Y
2008 71
2010 59
2011 62
2012 68
2013 63
2014 65
2015 65
2016 70
2017 71
2018 72
}\ClimateViewsAmericansHappening

2014 51

2016 54
2017 56
2018 60
}\ClimateViewsAmericansHumanCaused
